name: SPEED (itch) (Munch333)
description:
SPEED is a game for a competition with my friend, he made a scratch project:work in progress

Controls

SPACE + DIRECTION: DASH

WASD TO MOVE

CLICK TO SHOOT

MOVE MOUSE CURSOR TO LOOK AROUND

SPEED V.3 is the latest version of the game as of 9/3/21

Speedrun.com page:https://www.speedrun.com/speed/run/y933jrey
